title: 请问一下MC里面有类似TR的飞爪的mod么=-=
author: Lilian
txt_content: 玩了TR回来以后没有飞爪好不习惯……

replies.author: craft
replies.txt_content:
有。而且很多。举几个例子：
泰拉瑞亚3D mod。http://bbs.minecraftxz.com/forum ... 6orderby%3Dlastpost
绳子加mod。http://bbs.minecraftxz.com/forum ... 6orderby%3Dlastpost
钩爪钓竿mod。http://bbs.minecraftxz.com/thread-520-1-1.html

replies.author: NHN
replies.txt_content: 哇啊啊啊啊啊，这是要逆天哇！
